package.description:
This package contains a redistribution of the paramiko library by Robey Pointer. It has been modified to restructure Python source files to ROS package conventions and files relating to installing paramiko using easy_install have been removed to eliminate confusion.
Unaltered distribution can be downloaded from: http://www.lag.net/paramiko/download/paramiko-1.7.1.zip
Paramiko is a library for making SSH2 connections (client or server). Emphasis is on using SSH2 as an alternative to SSL for making secure connections between python scripts. All major ciphers and hash methods are supported. SFTP client and server mode are both supported too.
Required packages: pyCrypto
package.author: Robey Pointer/robey@lag.net. ROS package maintained by Ken Conley.
